author: pquerna
msg: Refactoring of how OpenStack based drivers authenticate and find their base URLs.  This also changed how other drivers did 'secure' port selection, and make Connection.port the actual port we are connecting on, and Connection.secure to just be an indiciator if we should use SSL or not, rather than changing the port.

author: sebb
msg: Bug 51380 - Control reuse of cached SSL Context from iteration to iteration

author: igalic
msg: TS-953: consolidate string copy/concat for mgmt/web2
